item.title: Transmission 1.20 Released
item.description:
Transmission now requires Mac OS X 10.4.11 with Security Update 2008-002. Mac OS X 10.5 or greater is recommended.

Core Changes:

  • Support https tracker connections
  • IP blocking using the Bluetack Level1 blocklist
  • Better support of multitracker torrents
  • Faster UPnP port mapping on startup
  • Ability to reset global statistics
  • Various bugfixes

Mac-specific Changes:

  • Display of decimal numbers matches system international settings
  • Updated Dock badge images

For a full list of changes, click here.

Transmission 0.72 and earlier: Complete your downloads before upgrading or you will lose data!
